Code

Link to my github page

Code for research projects:
  • Jump Risk, Estimation and Implications: Constructing the model-free jump measure from the cross-section of equity options.
  • Real and Financial Options: Numerical solution to continuous time model and discrete time structural model.
  • Reaching for Yield: Numerical solutions for Campbell and Sigalov (2022)
